name: THE WAY (itch) (OnTheMARC)
description:
A short 2D platformer game about THE WAY.   

The goal is to reach the other side (where the bright light is).

Play and learn more about The Way.

***Play in full screen***

CONTROLS

"A"  "D" or LEFT & RIGHT arrow keys - Player Movement. Push lava blocks.

"SPACE" or UP arrow key - Player Jump.

OBJECTIVE

Reach the other side.

You can earn points by collective different items along the way.

CREDITS

VOiD1 Gaming - background song. 

Check his amazing works here: https://void1gaming.itch.io/
